title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Create a modern portfolio website for a software developer to showcase their projects, skills, and professional experience. The website should be visually appealing and optimized for performance.
features: Home page with introduction and featured projects
Projects page with filtering by technology/category
About page with professional background and skills
additionalContext: The portfolio should have a clean, minimalist design that emphasizes content and showcases technical skills. Performance is important - aim for high Lighthouse scores. Include a custom domain setup process in the deployment instructions. The site should be easily customizable for the user to update with their own information.
